title: The Golden Flute
description: A traditional Chinese folktale,  The Golden Flute  recounts the story of a little girl who is taken from her mother by an evil dragon. A series of magical events lead up to the girl's rescue. Readers will follow along as the girl's brother travels on the age-old journey of good verses evil to conquer the dragon and rescue his sister.
